concept.title: Internal URL Filters
concept.shortdesc: Internal URL filters identify the referrers that you consider internal to your site.

conbody.p: A referrer, or referring page, is typically the page from which a visitor entered your site. To avoid skewing data, you can filter out internal referrers. Reports exclude filtered referrers from the Referrers Report, the Referring Domains Report, and other Finding Methods reports.
